nodes.text: Leidra was a female Daan from the planet Melida/Daan. Daughter of Pei and wife of Micae, she was the mother of four sons, the youngest of which was Nield. After leaving five-year-old Nield with his cousin, she left to fight and die in a battle against the Melida one month after her husband and three older sons had died in a similar battle. A hologram of Leidra was placed in a Hall of Evidence over Lake Weir in the Outer Circle region around Melida/Daan's capital city of Zehava.
